infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Noble Narrator uses the camera to capture photos inside the app before you publish them.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Noble Narrator accesses your photo library to let you choose media that appears in the app.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Noble Narrator uses the microphone to record audio tracks that the app attaches to your creations.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Noble Narrator uses speech recognition to turn your spoken words into text inside the app.
